programme.title: Project Runway S21
programme.desc: Working with real people as their clients, the designers must create looks for a night on the town that include a jaw-dropping reveal.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Sandokan survives a fake poison, part of Brooke’s pact with Marianne: her hand for Sandokan’s freedom. Brooke hopes Sandokan will overthrow the Sultan, leaving room for him. Indeed, Sandokan returns to the jungle, leading the Dayaks’ to free the slaves. Brooke strikes a deal with Guillonk to suppress the revolt in exchange for becoming Rajah. When Marianne learns of this, she escapes and warns Sandokan. The Sultan is killed, Brooke rules Sarawak, but the Dayaks are free. Marianne and Sandokan begin a new life as revolutionaries on the hidden island of Mompracem.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor S8
programme.desc: A friendly retired couple delights a family with young children when they move in next door. Then the new neighbours' dog attacks the children's mother, setting off a conflict that ends in two murders.

programme.title: Celebrity Wheel of Fortune S5
programme.desc: Hosted by Pat Sajak and Vanna White, "Celebrity Wheel of Fortune" welcomes celebrities to solve word puzzles for a chance to win up to $1 million. All of the money won goes to a charity of their choice.

programme.desc: Sandokan helps fight off a raid by the Sultan’s men, but is captured when Lang betrays him. programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: The chefs walk in on an epic battle of Last Chance Kitchen and are drafted into the fight. Once Tom declares a winner, the chefs immediately begin a challenge making dishes based on Prohibition Era cocktails. Chef Ken Oringer joins Padma, Tom and Graham at a Roaring 20’s party with Flappers and Dapper Dans.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: Lena Waithe surprises the chefs, by challenging them to make their best version of the trademark Kentucky dish, the Hot Brown. Then super-chef Nancy Silverton brings her internationally renowned friend, butcher Dario Cecchini to break down a whole cow for the chefs to utilize along with locally-sourced Kentucky ingredients.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: With more shoreline than Florida, Kentucky is a hotbed for houseboats. For this elimination challenge, the chefs are split into two teams and tasked with throwing raging party in Lake Cumberland. Mega-chef Emeril Lagasse joins Padma, Tom and Nilou along with Captains Sandy and Lee from Below Deck for some houseboat hysteria.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: The chefs take a roadtrip to Nashville and have the honor of cooking on the stage of the Grand Ole Opry for country music sensation Hunter Hayes. Then they have to dig deep to create a dish inspired by a vibrant music memory. It’s a personal and emotional cook as the chefs put their hearts on a plate for a full table of Nashville food and music giants including Kings of Leon frontman Caleb Followill, model Lily Aldridge, and Chef Jonathan Waxman.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: Kentucky based Top Chef alum Ed Lee drops by for a Quickfire that’s part trivia, part culinary creativity. Then, the Chefs head to Rupp Arena where legendary basketball Coach John Calipari and the UK Wildcats host a concession stand cook-off. Food & Wine Editor-in-Chief Hunter Lewis gets a courtside seat as he joins the judges to see which chef will take center court and who will get dunked.

programme.title: The Presidents
programme.desc: An inside look at the Battle of Midway, the aircraft used on both sides of the fight, and the dramatic story of one fighter pilot and his pivotal role in America’s first true victory of the Pacific War.

programme.title: The Presidents
programme.desc: Okinawa was the site of the last battle of the last great war of the 20th century, with a casualty rate in the tens of thousands. Through it all, military cameramen risked their lives to film the conflict, from brutal land combat to fierce kamikaze attacks at sea.

programme.title: Aerial Italy
programme.desc: Days before Christmas in 1988, one of the worst air disasters in history occurred over Scotland. Pan Am Flight 103 exploded at 31,000 feet, falling in fiery sections of wreckage that tragically changed the hillside town of Lockerbie forever.

programme.title: Aerial Italy
programme.desc: From heiress of a giant media empire to wanted felon, witness the strange saga of the Patty Hearst kidnapping of 1974.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: Explore the mysterious death of musician and Rolling Stones founder Brian Jones. Was it the rock-and-roll lifestyle or foul play? See how new videotapes and a virtual autopsy bring light to a story that’s been painted black.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: Join the search for the identity of a two-year-old victim of the historic Titanic sinking. See how forensic tests, first-hand accounts, and new DNA evidence may finally put a name to the unknown victim.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: Investigate the death of iconic 1990s starlet Brittany Murphy. Watch experts recreate her untimely death through eye-witness accounts, a virtual autopsy, and chemical analysis to understand how a lifestyle of excess may have led to her demise.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Uncover the bizarre demise of the world’s most famous magician. Watch experts recreate Houdini’s legendary escapes to determine whether his death was accidental, or if he was the victim of a powerful group that wanted him dead.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Uncover the details behind the death of the world’s most powerful drug lord. Examine new documents, videotapes, and an interview with Escobar’s son to reveal who fired the fatal shot when Escobar went down in a hail of bullets.

programme.title: Ainsley Eats The Streets
programme.desc: This documentary series shows five generations of jet engines. These fighter jets are capable of carrying bombs and soar close to the edge of space. The sixth generation of fighter jets began in 2020, and the 11th season has covered most of the air artillery since then.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: The instinct to secure a mate is one of the most powerful that there is. From the beautiful to the bizarre, this episode explores the most amazing mating rituals from right across the animal kingdom.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: This episode explores the world’s most toxic animals, revealing how poison and venom have given them the edge over the competition in their fight for survival.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: This episode explores how nature’s toughest animals have adapted to the extreme conditions in some of the planet’s most inhospitable environments.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: As winter draws to a close, the Atlantic springs back to life. Fish that spent the winter out in the deeper water have returned. An eagle pair has set up home high above the perfect fishing spot.

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: Summer means food is plentiful and this year's youngsters must feed, grow and prepare to start life alone. For puffins it's a massive leap of faith as they jump from their cliff-top nests into the ocean.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: In the Atlantic's far north, autumn is the season of gales, cooling temperatures and driving rain. This is when the wildlife must make the final preparations for winter or migrate to warmer climes.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: The end of winter heralds one of the world's greatest feeding frenzies as large ocean predators target the millions of fish who have found refuge in the Gulf of Alaska.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: As winter draws to a close, the Atlantic springs back to life. Fish that spent the winter out in the deeper water have returned. An eagle pair has set up home high above the perfect fishing spot.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Summer means food is plentiful and this year's youngsters must feed, grow and prepare to start life alone. For puffins it's a massive leap of faith as they jump from their cliff-top nests into the ocean.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Mena restaurant-hops with friends Lilly Singh and Laura Marano, indulging in plant-based French pastries, "pastrami" sammies, Thai "chicken" wings and "carne" asada.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: A diverse group of chefs create mouth-watering plant-based dumplings, fried `chik'n' sandwiches and Vietnamese `catfish'; Mena forages for lobster mushrooms and visits the oldest tofu factory in America.

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: Mena explores his Canadian backyard, discovering delicious plant-based sushi, pistachio cannolis, and pizza; he gets hands-on at a vegan cheese factory with comedian Bassem Youssef.

programme.title: Costa Rica: The Rise Of Nature
programme.desc: In a frenzy of mezcal and spice, Mena devours a host of local delicacies: plant-based seafood, agua chile and classic enfrijoladas. Later, Mena joins a local abuela to make traditional moles.

programme.title: Destination Myanmar
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Texas is a vegan oasis; Mena explores the off-beat Texan Capitol's surprising plant-based bounty: fried chicken, larger-than-life biscuits, short rib baos and mouth-watering vegan brisket.

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Mena returns to his home town and makes vegan ice cream with musician Tesher, then swings home to get a taste of his mum's Egyptian cooking.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Ben’s food journey starts in the West Coast of the South Island. He meets the only NZ cranberry producer at a farm in Hokitika and travels to Blackball to learn how chorizo is made. He cooks a range of dishes at the beach incorporating these local delicacies, matched with a local beer.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Ben visits High Peak Station in Canterbury and learns of their high -country farm to fork experience and tales of multigenerational stewardship. On the wild Tora Coast he meets a couple who harvest kaimoana sustainably – launching their fishing boat into the sea using a bulldozer.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. Suddenly she's collapses in fits of tickly giggles, there are ants everywhere.. Mimi can't paint, tho, whilst she's being tickled and Jess works out they are here for her honey sandwiches!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: The friends are having a tidying up day. programme.title: Guess with Jess

programme.desc: Academy Award®-Nominee Sylvester Stallone stars in this explosive action-thriller that will keep you on the edge of your seat until the final, powerful frame!

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he’d want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: Every district in the nation of Panem must send a boy and girl to fight to the death in the annual Hunger Games competition. Jennifer Lawrence is 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen, who volunteers to take her younger sister’s place in the games.

programme.title: The Librarian: The Curse Of The Judas Chalice
programme.desc: Losing his girlfriend because he was at an auction getting the magical Philosopher's Stone, Flynn Carsen is ordered to take a vacation. In New Orleans he finds himself busy protecting the Judas Chalice and saving the world from vampires.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 1
programme.desc: The worldwide phenomenon continues. Katniss (Jennifer Lawrence) has survived and destroyed the Hunger Games, and now rises with District 13 to fight against President Snow (Donald Sutherland).

programme.title: 10.5 Apocalypse Part 1
programme.desc: A massive earthquake creates a chain of events that threaten two of the largest nuclear reactors.

programme.title: 10.5 Apocalypse Part 2
programme.desc: A massive earthquake creates a chain of events that threaten two of the largest nuclear reactors.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: The Librarian: The Quest For The Spear
programme.desc: A bookworm becomes the librarian. Same night a magical spear gets stolen and he's off to get some real life experience around the globe on his quest for the spear - starting with being thrown off a plane over Amazonas by his cute helper.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he’d want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

programme.title: The Librarian: The Return To King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: Adventurer Flynn Carsen receives a secret map to King Solomon's Mines. When the map is stolen, Flynn sets out to find the map and the Key of Solomon's book, without which the map is useless anyway.

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as tough detective John Kimble in Kindergarten Cop, going undercover as a teacher to find a drug lord's wife. Packed with action, humor, and heart, it’s a classic comedy-thriller.

programme.title: Elimination Game
programme.desc: Navy SEAL Rick is sentenced to rot in a military prison until he is offered the opportunity to put his life on the line and win his freedom in a kill or be killed reality show. Rick will have to eliminate some of the world's most notorious killers on live TV to gain his freedom and clear his name. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: CSI S5 E22 - Weeping Willows
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
programme.desc: An intriguing drama about criss-crossed relationships. The people who were loving, using and losing each other.

programme.title: Burlesk Queen
programme.desc: One of the classics of Philippine cinema wherein screen ingenue Vilma Santos made her transition into matured actress. Into this world came the young girl who becomes its last shining star. But as her presence brought life into the old art, her own existence is endangered by the decaying surroundings.

programme.title: Nagalit Ang Buwan Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: A story of married couples but leaves their own spouses for their relationship.

programme.title: Antipolo Massacre
programme.desc: Based on a true to life story of Cecilia Masagca Antipolo Massacre is one of the most vindictive and brutal films of 1994. Possessed by an evil spirit lurked into his soul, Winifredo (Cesar Montano) brought misery and affliction to his once happy and contented family life.

programme.title: Tumayo Ka't Lumaban
programme.desc: Crisanto (Ronnie Ricketts) is a man with a mission. Circumstances have forced him and his sister to be raised by separate foster families. But now, Crisanto is determined to find his sister.

programme.title: Adan Lazaro (Search and Destroy)
programme.desc: Roi Vinzon portrays Adan Lazaro, a highly specialized intelligence agent who returns to his motherland to stop a group of terrorists who are out to wreck havoc to the country's ailing economy.

programme.title: Uubusin Ko Ang Lahi Mo
programme.desc: The canonigos led by Mayor Placido (Eddie Gutierrez) have enjoyed sole political control of the town for sometime now. But their abusive reign is threatened when Fortunato Guerrero (Robert Arevalo) plans to enter the political arena in the coming elections. The Guerrero and Canonigo clans both vow to eliminate the each other.

programme.title: Bobby Barbers, Parak
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life exploits of Bobby Barbers, Secretary of the Department of Interior and Local Government. It chronicles his life as a young lawyer, a politician and most of all as the celebrated no-nonsense law-enforcer, who became the scourge of wrong-doers all over the country.

programme.title: Wanted: Perfect Mother
programme.desc: A dashing widower named Dante (Christopher De Leon) is scouting for a tutor for his daughter, then a girl named Sam (Regine Velasquez) walks in and turned their once lonely home into a carnival.

programme.title: Laging Naroon Ka
programme.desc: Opposites attract. And so they say. When the saintly, introverted Quinito meets the candid, out-going Trixie, there are no sparks flying to great heavens. In fact, both think that there’s just no way they can ever click.

programme.title: Tinik Sa Dibdib (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a searing drama about a young woman who got married to escape from her family of parasites only to find herself in a worse situation.

programme.title: Sala Sa Init, Sala Sa Lamig
programme.desc: Bingo was a bounty hunter. He hunted prized criminals dead or alive. On the other hand, Vina was a street hustler. They crossed paths when Bingo rented a space near Vina purposely to track down a professional hitman, Mike.

programme.title: Hiram Na Mukha
programme.desc: Famous plastic surgeon Dr. Hugo (Christopher de Leon) worships the ground his fiancee Alicia (Nanette Medved) walks on. That is because he feels Alicia is his creation.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from January 23, Day 13 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Kimura Masahiko is a legend of the bonsai world who has won the Prime Minister's Award, one of the industry's highest honors, 27 times. He talks about creating original works that break the mold.

programme.title: IMPACTS: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: Climate change has begun to impact the food supply. In Japan, hotter summers and stronger typhoons are affecting rice. Researchers are now working to develop rice that can withstand such challenges.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Two Scenic Views
programme.desc: We break down a print that warps space to allow the viewer to be in two places at once: Shinobazu Pond, known for its lotus flowers, and the Sumida River, one of Edo's busiest waterways.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Biologic drugs, made mainly from antibodies, have transformed the approach to treating chronic inflammatory diseases such as asthma and rheumatoid arthritis. We explore their mechanisms and potential.

programme.title: KANSAI DEEPER
programme.desc: Small octopus balls cooked on grills have engendered a food culture unto their own and are Osaka's leading soul food. Explore the essence of Osaka that prizes tasty, affordable, and satisfying food.

programme.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: When a deadly secret resurfaces, five friends are stalked by a vengeful killer.

programme.title: ZOMBIELAND: DOUBLE TAP
programme.desc: Through comic mayhem from the White House to the heartland, four slayers face off against new kinds of evolved zombies and new human survivors.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. (SEASON 7)
programme.desc: When a crew of violent eco-terrorists abducts the teenage son of an energy company executive, SWAT must untangle the kidnappers' twisted motives before carrying out a high-stakes rescue mission.

programme.title: ELSBETH (SEASON 1)
programme.desc: When the world’s top tennis champion drops dead on the court, Elsbeth and Kaya hone in on a rising tennis star and his competitive father and coach.

programme.title: FBI: INTERNATIONAL (SEASON 3)
programme.desc: " When ex-FBI agent Bill Cormack (guest star Jeffrey Pierce), captured by hostile forces in Libya years ago, suddenly resurfaces in a brutal Tripoli prison, Forrester and Powell risk everything to go undercover as prisoners to break him out.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS (SEASON 14)
programme.desc: Eddie and Badillo try to help a man whose apartment has been taken over by a squatter who also happens to be Jamie's confidential informant.

programme.title: FBI (SEASON 6)
programme.desc: After an employee of the U.S. Army is shot in an industrial park, the team works to track down the killer who reveals a larger plot at play. Meanwhile, Tiffany continues to struggle with the guilt surrounding Hobbs' death.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE (SEASON 5)
programme.desc: 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, "Moving Day", to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that's being torn down.

programme.title: CORONER (SEASON 1)
programme.desc: When Dr. Jenny Cooper's (Serinda Swan) life is upended by the untimely death of her husband, she changes her professional focus, becoming the newly appointed coroner in Toronto.

programme.title: CORONER (SEASON 1)
programme.desc: When Jenny (Serinda Swan) is called to a luxe condo to investigate the death of a cannabis mogul, she enters an alternate world where nothing is as it seems.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE (SEASON 5)
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down Ted McDonald. But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking…

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE (SEASON 5)
programme.desc: A month after the evidence room bombing, Andy and Sam return from a much-needed vacation ready to work.

programme.title: THE BOURNE IDENTITY
programme.desc: Oscar® winner Matt Damon stars in this action-packed thriller about an elite government agent who is pulled from the sea with two bullets in his back and no memory of his violent past.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE (SEASON 1)
programme.desc: As the Silver family observes Yahrzeit to honor patriarch Ben Silver on the one-year anniversary of his death, Lena and Danny investigate the murder of a beloved shop owner. Meanwhile, Sarah responds to a hostage crisis and Mae faces a difficult legal decision.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN (SEASON 1)
programme.desc: Jake (Daniel Gillies) encourages Tess (Dolly Lewis) to talk to Superintendent Bennett (Roger Cross) about getting her old job back, but her hopes are cut short by his disappointing offer to join the Metro PD only to ride a desk.

programme.title: LONG BRIGHT RIVER (SEASON 1)
programme.desc: Mickey puts herself in danger while following up on the Dock lead. Mickey brings Thomas and Truman to her family’s Thanksgiving and Paula's reaction to a new piece of evidence makes Mickey question everything.

programme.title: THE ROOKIE (SEASON 8)
programme.desc: John Nolan, the oldest rookie in the LAPD, has used his life experience, determination and sense of humor to keep up with rookies 20 years his junior. Nearing the end of his training, Nolan now faces his biggest challenge as a police officer when he must come to terms with the choices he has made in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: DOC (SEASON 2)
programme.desc: A patient forces Amy to confront the realities of medical tourism, TJ helps a veteran with his prosthetic and Joan drops a bombshell.

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: A former extreme sports athlete is recruited by the government for a special undercover mission.

programme.title: AMERICAN NINJA WARRIOR (SEASON 15)
programme.desc: The qualifying rounds continue in L.A., with ninjas from across the country taking on the world's most challenging obstacle course. New obstacle 'The Cubes' makes its debut.

programme.title: The World - Episode 3

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Autumn: Indoor Stunners & Bruny Island
programme.desc: Costa finds a green-walled rental; Hannah visits Bruny Island; Millie plants winter seeds; Josh explores a tropical oasis; Tammy preserves flowers; Jerry busts myths about natives; Sophie profiles tough Mediterranean plants.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off - Episode 7
programme.desc: Twelve home bakers take part in a bake-off to test their baking skills as they battled to be crowned The Great Australian Bake Off's best amateur baker.

programme.title: Common Cause - Ageing Well - Indonesia
programme.desc: As Indonesia's elderly population grows faster than the global average, Romy Hidayat creates an innovative senior care program in his community, backed by Indonesia's expat community in Australia - and their culinary skills.

programme.title: Great Australian Road Trips - Episode 4
programme.desc: Four high-profile Australian stars embark on an epic road trip across the country's most iconic landscapes, one unforgettable pit-stop at a time. With Melissa Leong, Nazeem Hussain, Claudia Karvan and Steph Tisdell.

programme.title: Common Cause - Changing the Game - Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Nihlar's life was like everyone else's until she discovered her passion for cricket through an Australian-backed effort to foster social cohesion and empower girls in Sri Lanka's North, still healing from decades of conflict.

programme.title: Landline: Mekong Special - Cambodia and Laos

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: Central Park
programme.desc: A group of teenagers hang out for a night of fun in Central Park, but encounters a revenge-seeking killer who plans to kill them off one by one to pay for the sins of one of their fathers.

programme.title: Mid-night Two
programme.desc: Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Arthur Shawcross tells a lot of stories about his life before he began to kill. He might have been known for killing women along Rochester's Genesee River, but his first murder was years earlier.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: An undercover NYPD officer and an ATF special agent learn firsthand not to trust a suspect's demeanour, regardless of how amicable it may appear.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: Tara Grinstead's sudden disappearance goes unexplained for 11 years until a surprising statement to law enforcement from Bo Dukes, a former student, names his friend and former classmate as her killer.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: After rideshare driver Carolina Vargas drove a nice stranger to his hotel, she didn't have qualms about giving him another ride. But her trusting gesture turned tragic.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi Jones motherless. Nearly 40 years later, Heidi vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: January 5, 2016, Baltimore, MD. Police officers respond to a report of a deceased man found at the Deluxe Plaza Motel in Northeast Baltimore.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When a young mother, Selonia Reed, 26, is found brutally murdered in her car, detectives turn over every rock in small-town Hammond, Louisiana, in search of her killer.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A local trip becomes a harrowing ordeal for one family when they're surrounded by an angry mob that attacks their vehicle; a laundromat owner is beaten by unruly patrons from the business next door.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A typical Sunday morphs into a violent gunfight when two armed men invade a family's home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Dubbed 'the vampire killer,' teen Mathew Hardman thought that taking a life would make him immortal. His victim was an elderly neighbour. After stabbing her, he removed her heart and drank her blood.

programme.desc: A young, pregnant woman is found dead of an apparent suicide in Saginaw, MI, but her family and friends don't believe it. The police discover a shocking secret they never saw coming.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: An elderly woman gets arrested for domestic battery after fighting with her sister. Meanwhile in Virginia Beach, a 19-year-old boy gets extradited from Miami after missing his court date.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: African-American women in the Mt Pleasant neighbourhood of Cleveland were vanishing. Their families cried for help, but no one knew what was happening. No one except Anthony Sowell.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A convicted quadruple murderer argues with the judge; a pastor who stole from his church hears it from a member of his congregation; a man who murdered his grandparents becomes disorderly in the courtroom.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A judge lashes out at a defence attorney who refers to his drunk driving client as a hero; a religious leader convicted of sexually abusing minors hears it from his victims; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: When a Tulsa father of two is shot just blocks from his ex-girlfriend's house, detectives have to decide which of two persons of interest should be charged with his murder.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: For nearly a year, investigators from multiple law enforcement agencies work tirelessly to uncover a twisted tale of secrets and lies that led to murder.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: During a routine undercover prostitution sting, Columbus Vice Detective Andrew Mitchell shoots and kills 23-year-old Donna Dalton Castleberry.

programme.title: The First 48 (S26)
programme.desc: Tulsa police find a woman beaten to death during a welfare check, and a son witnesses his father's murder while renovating a house.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Companion piece to the movie Black Girl Missing. While the media goes into a frenzy over missing white girls, Black women's disappearances receive muted coverage and limited police resources.

Today, we are constantly confronted with representations of young, strong, smooth, perfect bodies. For some, staying young becomes an ideal, even the dream of a lifetime. With advances in science and technological progress, are we on the way to eternal youth? Laurent Mathieu attempts the experience.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: Visit the Yves Saint Laurent museum and meet the great couturier. Somewhere between cinema and pop culture, Julien Fournié is deploying his art of haute couture on the red carpets. Jean Paul Gaultier invites Simone Rocha to revisit his archives. Micro or macro embroidery: Cyrielle Leclère steps outside the traditional framework.

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France
programme.desc: Welcome aboard the ''Marcel Angie III''! For Stéphane, one of Saint Pierre's last-remaining fishermen, it's the height of the snow crab season. More than a passion, his profession is a veritable way of life.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: Le Journal De L'Économie, Entreprises
programme.desc: Programme focusing on the story of a French company which takes up exporting and enjoys success in the international markets.

programme.title: Allons-Y Franco !
programme.desc: Every Friday, journalists from the French-language media and TV5MONDE's partner channels share their views on current affairs.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Magazine

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Intérieurs
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine opens the doors of an extraordinary flea market and then discovers the creative art of tufting. Lilian and Valentin sneak into Cléaure's home, who has completely renovated an old bourgeois house while keeping its old-world charm.

programme.title: Paname
programme.desc: Yvan Hallouin walks around Paris and its surroundings. In each stroll, the soul and identity of the 'City of Light' are examined through encounters with the local inhabitants and historical anecdotes.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'Actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'Économie, Entreprises
programme.desc: Programme focusing on the story of a French company which takes up exporting and enjoys success in the international markets.

programme.title: Allons-Y Franco !
programme.desc: Every Friday, journalists from the French-language media and TV5MONDE's partner channels share their views on current affairs.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, Émilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Métiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ça
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Jeux De La Fontaine
programme.desc: Every four years, the best athletes in the animal kingdom gather at the Coubertin Fountain for their own version of the Winter Olympics. Fox, Sheep, She-Wolf, Mouse: they'll all be challenging one another in a series of sporting events in the hope of winning a medal.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les Triplés
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: L'Aventure Du Monde Des Mondes
programme.desc: Dimitri, Raph's and Anaïs's uncle, is a French globetrotter who is fascinated by nature. He gives them tasks to stimulate their creativity. Thanks to Blox, a small robot, they access the ''world of the worlds'', a secret fantasy place where they can play and learn.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Télévisions).

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison !
programme.desc: We explore the Telli housing estate, which is home to one eighth of the population of Aarau in the canton of Aargau. A surprising complex! Then we're off to Gretzenbach, where Ueli Anliker has built a custom-built home for his family. A house in the style of a Buddhist temple.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Côte d'Azur.

programme.title: Suisse En Scène
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Dan, Alexandre, Eric and Anthony are four Vietnamese brothers. Refugees in France, welcomed by the Red Cross in Autun, they discovered almost by chance the world of solidarity and in 1990 they launched the Phuong workshop. Today, their creations are displayed in the most prestigious museums, testifying to their know-how.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: Meet three ultra-cyclists! Raphaël Boissy, Bastien Duvalet and Harley Glegg have decided to cycle from Monaco to Istanbul.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Papilles
programme.desc: A journey rich in flavour through the regions and their terroirs, exploring local specialities and meeting the artisans perpetuating their age-old culinary traditions. An opportunity to stop off in the kitchen of a talented chef to prepare an emblematic regional recipe.

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jérôme Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Les Maîtres Du Tofu
programme.desc: The tofu has made a recent appearance on Western plates. Neutral in taste, it is eaten seasoned, cooked, raw, as a dish, as a side, as a dessert... A journey from China to Japan and Vietnam, through soybean fields, production workshops and traditional markets, to discover tofu.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: An in-depth look at an extraordinary jeweller: the story of Tournaire. All about eating lobster. A sculptural style with a hint of the industrial: an immersive visit to Victoria Wilmotte's studio. suit or oversized suit, shirt and tie: the tailored look is riding high.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: In the heart of Lyon, the Musée des Beaux-Arts houses 90,000 works of art. Lucille Boitelle is an ornamental painter who creates worlds that embellish any surface. Sensual and ethereal: the show by Uruguayan designer Gabriela Hearst. In Douarnenez, ceramist Mathieu Casseau handles clay with vigour and gentleness.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Savourer
programme.desc: On the menu: beef with broccoli, bruschetta burger, fried cod with Mexican salsa sauce, polenta with Italian sausages, strawberry and basil crumble.

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France
programme.desc: Once he's lifted all his pots, it's time for Stéphane to head back to port and unload his catch. But for this fisherman, making the most of life also includes passing on the tradition of fishing for snow crabs, one that dates back three centuries, to his sons.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Les Nouveaux Boss
programme.desc: Welcome to the first pan-African competition dedicated to entrepreneurs! Four emblematic mentors are travelling across French-speaking Africa to identify the entrepreneurs who will drive the economy of tomorrow. Sixteen candidates will be selected to join the Station; ten of them will face a panel of investors in the grand final.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Dan, Alexandre, Eric and Anthony are four Vietnamese brothers. Refugees in France, welcomed by the Red Cross in Autun, they discovered almost by chance the world of solidarity and in 1990 they launched the Phuong workshop. Today, their creations are displayed in the most prestigious museums, testifying to their know-how.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: An in-depth look at an extraordinary jeweller: the story of Tournaire. All about eating lobster. A sculptural style with a hint of the industrial: an immersive visit to Victoria Wilmotte's studio. suit or oversized suit, shirt and tie: the tailored look is riding high.

programme.title: À Qui Profite Le Doute ?
programme.desc: The body of a drug dealer is found in the port of Marseille. All signs point to his murder by Sybille Varlet, the daughter of a famous shipowner, who used to buy drugs from him. Determined to save her daughter, Véra Varlet calls for help from her ex-partner, former commissioner Costello.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: In the heart of Lyon, the Musée des Beaux-Arts houses 90,000 works of art. Lucille Boitelle is an ornamental painter who creates worlds that embellish any surface. Sensual and ethereal: the show by Uruguayan designer Gabriela Hearst. In Douarnenez, ceramist Mathieu Casseau handles clay with vigour and gentleness.

programme.title: Anti-Squat
programme.desc: Inès is bringing up her teenage son alone and is threatened with eviction. In search of a steady job, she is hired at Anti-squat, which houses people in unoccupied offices to keep squatters away. Her role is to recruit residents, keep an eye on them and enforce strict rules.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
